overview: Reza "Mad Dog" Madadi was at the peak of his career. A celebrated MMA star with lucrative sponsorship contracts for UFC. He and his wife Kate expected their first child. Everything he dreamed about as a little boy was going to happen. One early morning in May 2013, it changed , forever. This documentary depicts his struggle for revenge. The film focuses on the social issues of prejudice, racism , shame, pride and the struggle to find your place in life.
title: Mad Dog
